fields.Video Description: This video was recorded by Kunto Nurcahyoko in West Kalimantan, Indonesia and features Andarius speaking Bemak. Bemak, also known as Ngabang, is considered a dialect of Piti, a Piti-Atsam language belonging to the Benue-Congo group within the Niger-Congo language family. ... (??)
